test_data.instruction: Send an email to your advisor Dr. Johnson asking about office hours for next week.

details.subject: Office Hours Inquiry
details.body: Dear Dr. Johnson, I would like to know your office hours for next week. Thank you.

test_data.instruction: Add a study session to your calendar for tomorrow from 2-4 PM in the library.
